root_causes.description: High AR exceptions due to data entry errors and reconciliation discrepancies
Bank duplicates caused by inadequate reconciliation processes
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential financial misstatements due to duplicate records

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation checks and automated reconciliation tools for AR processes
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% within next quarter

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation procedures to include duplicate detection algorithms
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate records in bank reconciliation reports
